General.Name: Quang Viet Enterprise Co Ltd
General.Description: Quang Viet Enterprise Co., Ltd. manufactures, process, and sells garments in Taiwan. It also manufactures and process raw material comprising of feather and down and medical products. The company offers various types of jackets, including synthetic insulation, high puffer and packable down, seam seal, and water repellent. Quang Viet Enterprise Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1995 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

1.Name: Ms. Shu-Jung  Huang
1.Title: Assistant VP of Fin. & Accounting Department
